oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Adams family portrait
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Portrait of William Jasper Adams (1832-1918) and his family at Mill Creek. Adams was a local shoemaker, dentist, medical man, and farmer. He was married to Mary Elizabeth Wyatt Adams (1835-1904). Daughter Nancy Jane Adams Berrong (1857-1940) was a midwife, and Sletta Hamby also became a midwife.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Families; Children; Portraits
